Returns: true if the listener has consumed the event (i.e., the default behavior should not occur), false otherwise (i.e., the default behavior should occur). The default behavior is for the camera move such that it is centered on the user location.
onMyLocationButtonClick().Description: Called when the my location button is clicked. Use @B_com#google#android#gms#location#FusedLocationProviderApi_E@ if you need to obtain the user's current location.

ClassDesc: Callback interface for when the My Location button is clicked.
